ModMetaData.name: Kenshi Hiver Race
ModMetaData.author: Sharpedo-Dressed Man
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Hiver race from Kenshi, including 9 subraces: The Western Hive Soldier, Worker, and Prince and their counterparts of the Southern Hive and Deadhive. Also adds neutral and hostile factions representing the Western Hive and Southern Hive, respectively, as well as the Fogmen's Deadhive.
